rm -f *.o *~ include/*.o
rm -f collatz_par collatz_seq       
g++ -std=c++20 -I. -I./include -Wall  -O3 -march=native -c -o collatz_par.o collatz_par.cpp
g++ -std=c++20 -I. -I./include -Wall  -O3 -march=native -c -o include/collatz.o include/collatz.cpp
g++ -std=c++20 -I. -I./include -Wall  -O3 -march=native -c -o include/utilties.o include/utilties.cpp
g++ -std=c++20 -O3 -march=native collatz_par.o include/collatz.o include/utilties.o -o collatz_par -pthread 
g++ -std=c++20 -I. -I./include -Wall  -O3 -march=native -c -o collatz_seq.o collatz_seq.cpp
g++ -std=c++20 -O3 -march=native collatz_seq.o include/collatz.o include/utilties.o -o collatz_seq -pthread
